title: Ore no “Kantei” Skill ga Cheat Sugite – Densetsu no Yuusha o Yomi “Tori” Saikyou e - Novel Updates
tags: Ability Steal   Adapted to Manga   Beastkin   Cheats   Elves   Game Elements   Heroes   Male Protagonist
author: Sumimori Sai   すみもりさい   澄守彩
description:
Mel Lylute, who just turned 15, is called to receive his unique Skill. He then receives... Appraisal...
But, this calls the attention of bad people.
What will he do?>
